description.brief: local motion planning and obstacle avoidance based on the VFH* approach

package.description: This package contains an implementation of the Vector Field Histogram local obstacle avoidance based on the registration of consecutive laser scans, in 3D. Moreover, it provide a classical tree-based motion planning algorithm and the corresponding VFH* implementation
package.author: Janosch Machowinski/janosch.machowinski@dfki.de
